derivation: from G4012 (περισσός) (in the sense of beyond);
kjv_def: exceeding abundantly above, more abundantly, advantage, exceedingly, very highly, beyond measure, more, superfluous, vehement(-ly)
strongs_def: superabundant (in quantity) or superior (in quality); by implication, excessive; adverbially (with G1537 (περισσός)) violently; neuter (as noun) preeminence
outline:
1. exceeding some number or measure or rank or need
    1. over and above, more than is necessary, superadded
      1. exceeding abundantly, supremely
      2. something further, more, much more than all, more plainly
    2. superior, extraordinary, surpassing, uncommon
      1. pre-eminence, superiority, advantage, more eminent, more remarkable, more excellent
